thread.title: Ice still a problem on Alabama roadways Sunday morning, temperatures to rise midday
thread.title_full: Ice still a problem on Alabama roadways Sunday morning, temperatures to rise midday

author: Ivana Hrynkiw | ihrynkiw@al.com
title: Ice still a problem on Alabama roadways Sunday morning, temperatures to rise midday
text: While temperatures are expected to rise around noon today, many sheets of ice still exist on roadways in central Alabama. Law enforcement agencies are asking motorists to wait until this afternoon to get on the roads.
